name: Visual Sudoku puzzle solver
description:
This is a Proof-of-Concept attempt to detect and extract a Sudoku Puzzle from an image by using standard Computer Vision methods. No Supervised Machine Learning methods are used and that's intentional. Goal was to experiment with OpenCV and the standard CV techniques for de-noising and processing an image, recognize patterns and provide visualization.

There are 5 stages:

  • Clear the image from the noise so only the sudoku puzzle is left in the image
  • Find the pattern of the grid and extract the sudoku with the digits
  • Locate and identify the digits
  • Find the solution of the sudoku (out of scope for this project)
  • Present the solution back to the original image
